site.siteTagline: Use, stake, earn, and trade datatokens from professional data providers.
site.copyright: All Rights Reserved. Powered by [Ocean Protocol](https://oceanprotocol.com)

warning.main: We are in beta. Please familiarize yourself with [the market](https://medium.com/big-data-protocol/how-to-use-and-earn-in-the-bdp-data-market-c0ca133e34d1), [the risks](https://medium.com/big-data-protocol/how-to-use-and-earn-in-the-bdp-data-market-c0ca133e34d1), and the [Terms of Use](/terms).
warning.polygonPublish: Only republish data sets with a pool from ETH Mainnet into Polygon/Matic if the liquidity is **less than or equal to 1000 BDP in the original pool**. Doing otherwise will lead to purgatory for the data set in Polygon/Matic.

announcement.polygon: Polygon/Matic EVM support is in early stages. [Use the Polygon Bridge](https://docs.oceanprotocol.com/tutorials/polygon-bridge/) to get mBDP.
